backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor handling access control, user profiles, initial Bible stories, and storage hooks for verses and story images.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing UI authorization and admin‑status hook changes tied to specific frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend files, components, hooks, and pages for the Bible verses app.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS with OKLCH variables defining light/dark theme tokens and shared global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry page mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with site layout and all main routes such as home, stories, testament pages, and verse details.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting new authenticated users to enter their display name and saving it via React Query.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Global layout with header navigation, login button, profile dialog, and footer wrapping routed content.
frontend/src/components/story/ImageUploa: React component for displaying current story or verse image and allowing admins to upload and replace images with validation and progress tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and exposing identity and login status to the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, admin status, stories, verses, and uploading images through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining custom color themes, typography, and utility classes for verse and story styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point configuring React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering the main application.
frontend/src/pages/DailyVersePage.tsx: Page that displays the daily verse with loading, error handling, refresh capability, and styled layout.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page presenting navigation cards linking to daily verse, stories, and testament pages with styled icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/StoriesPage.tsx: Displays a list of Bible stories with loading/error states and navigation to individual story pages.
frontend/src/pages/StoryDetailPage.tsx: Shows details for a selected story, including summary, image upload, and key verses.
frontend/src/pages/TestamentPage.tsx: Lists verses from the selected testament with loading/error handling and navigation to verse details.
frontend/src/pages/VerseDetailPage.tsx: Displays details for a single verse with navigation back and optional image rendering.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, typography, animations, and plugin setup for the project.
project_state.json: JSON describing the project’s current state, including version info, overall website summary, architectural notes, and a list of implemented features with IDs, titles, and requirement links.
